mapper.select: select tt.index_code from (select index_code from mb_df_metadata_0002 where FRAME_ID in ( select FRAME_ID from mb_df_metadata_0001 where frame_id_path like #{frameIdPath} AND IS_DELETE ='1' and is_show=1) group by index_code) tt inner join mb_index_main_info mm on tt.index_code = mm.index_code and mm.update_status = '更新中'
